help-file.title: "PRISMATIC CUBE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on color of caster Type of spell: Generic
"Prismatic Cube" raises walls which cover all exits of the room that the caster is in. Each wall has a random effect if touched, similar to that of the spell 'Prismatic Spray'.
